# delegate

**Instance Property**

The controller’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any AMWorkflowControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Return Value

The controller’s delegate.

## Discussion

This object receives updates on the progress and state of the workflow controller.

## Accessing the Delegate

- **AMWorkflowControllerDelegate**: A set of optional methods that a delegate of a workflow controller implements.
